html:
12.2.20  8:51 pm   do you have any life tips?

     life tips are all over the place

     you seem like you might have some wisdom and i dont know how to

     just take a walk, you will surely step in some wisdom

12.2.20  8:44 pm   does "mental illness" come with the bonus of added sensitivities?

      sometimes

12.2.20  8:25 pm   Why do you always sing the wrong lyrics in improv covers?

      due to improv

12.2.20  7:55 pm   i have thought of expresssing the same thought in literally 16 ways and i don't like any of them. help?

      take another look at the first one you did

12.2.20  6:34 pm   What was your inspiration for "ball & stick"?

      they just looked so good together on the screen, i had to write something for them

12.2.20  5:13 pm   is reality real

      oh that would explain this tingling sensation in the sky

12.2.20  4:00 pm   You think bananas are pretty cool?

      yes

12.2.20  3:58 pm   What's your favorite of your videos

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.2.20  3:56 pm   Is "mt. saint helens is about to blow up" about seeing the bright side and keeping a positive outlook in life amid catastrophes?

      that's what it sounds like to me. i also hear various other things in it

12.2.20  3:38 pm   Your instructions for video making in the music video of "slow down" don't seem to be working, any advice?

      that's satire

12.2.20  3:24 pm   Do you like watermelons?

      too much melon for water, too much water for melon

12.2.20  1:28 pm   how to flabbergast someone

      on most days, people will flabbergast themselves. you can just take a hands-off approach

12.2.20  1:20 pm   What is the definition of parsley?

      a garden, on your plate

12.2.20  12:39 pm   is the moon made out of cheese?

      no

12.2.20  12:29 pm   are penguins evil?

      no

12.2.20  12:26 pm   Who were the paintings painted by in Long Long Long Journey?

      society

12.2.20  12:05 pm   how does one make a new language?

      it depends why

12.2.20  11:32 am   does wyoming exist

      yes, that is their claim to fame

12.2.20  10:56 am   will you release the song on christmas so it will be the best gift ever given to the human community?

      this might seem strange, but gifts are actually better when they are not on christmas, because they would be more unexpected

12.2.20  10:18 am   What's your opinion on maryland

      it's everywhere. you'll never find all of it. some of it might be in delaware

12.2.20  8:03 am   how high are you on the mountain of life?

      about half way

12.2.20  7:51 am   wheres waldo

      look in the mirror

12.2.20  6:08 am   why I am addicted to basses in "when I get older

      could be that bit of catnip i slipped in there

12.2.20  5:52 am   What is your opiniun on humans history? 

      it almost reminds me of the big bang

12.2.20  4:52 am   You got any ideas floating around?

      they are packed too densely. no room to float. suffocating

12.2.20  3:39 am   What is your opinion on people who only like one type of music?

      joke's on you, it's all the same type

12.2.20  2:19 am   How do you feel about pencils 

      fine

12.2.20  2:14 am   When you wrote and the days goes on, were you going through something tough

      no, that was one of the most joyful songwriting sessions i've ever had

12.2.20  12:37 am   I know this is a big question but like... why do you do what you do? What's your motivation/goal?

      i'm just trying to get everyone to be neighbors

12.2.20  12:34 am   what do you think of memory foam pillows

      ah, that makes me think of cancer and reproductive harm

12.2.20  12:33 am   What happened to make you stop making content?

     that's not actually how it really goes, but it can appear that way. typically what happens is, i attempt to make too much content and i choke on all of it before you even get to see it. this has been happening for the majority of my life so far. but eventually through sheer determination i am able to explode and the content comes out somehow, even if slightly bruised

     I'm sorry if this question is too personal.

12.1.20  11:41 pm   What's the most fun scale to play on piano (not in terms of songwriting, just the finger movements of it)?

      chromatic

12.1.20  11:31 pm   is the anagram thing your idea?

     no, it's an ancient artform. in latin, it was called "ars magna" which means Great Art

     would you mind if others did something similar?

     no

      Maybe with different languages?

     do as many languages as you can

12.1.20  11:02 pm   What are the complications of the universe's natural laws created by the bad thing you did in "Just Did a Bad Thing"?

      2 rights make a wrong

12.1.20  10:48 pm   What is your opinion on pineapple on pizza?

      sometimes the pineapple might be inside the pizza

12.1.20  10:33 pm   Bill tell me a fact about Worms

      not enough cans, to contain them all

12.1.20  10:14 pm   Do you eat Starburst with or without the peel

      i didn't realize starbursts were edible

12.1.20  9:52 pm   Would you consider including the word "societal" in a song?

      if songwriting goes well, there is not time to consider anything. consideration is mostly useless in songwriting

12.1.20  9:43 pm   What's your opinion on Pennsylvania?

      when you try to put wavy mountains into a rectangle

12.1.20  9:01 pm   In regards to Steve's two step program (find the mountain, climb the thing), which step are you on?

      i'm doing both at the same time, which is fucked

12.1.20  8:41 pm   Do you think you can give us an update on how things are going?

      yes

12.1.20  8:00 pm   Do you have a particular instrument you prefer to use when writing songs?

     yes

      I can only really write music using my ukulele, then play it on other instruments, so I was wondering if you were the same haha.

     yes, a lot of people do this. this is so the writing department and production department don't confuse each other

12.1.20  7:41 pm   How do your songs sound sad and uplifting at the same time?

      could be a reflection of the world all around us

12.1.20  7:34 pm   Is angry music okay?

      sure

12.1.20  6:26 pm   what are your predictions for 2021

      months will occur

12.1.20  5:27 pm   whats the difference between LP EP album

      i have no idea

12.1.20  4:32 pm   what is your biggest question?

      what the heck

12.1.20  3:54 pm   in your video "hi im steve" he said his name isnt steve but he said he is steve at the end so is his name steve or another name

      it's the same name as yours

12.1.20  2:26 pm   the visuals in your video are amazingly pleasing. how do you make them?

     we'll see

      they seem so hard to make.

     i'm making it easier but it's getting harder faster than i'm making it easier. my plan to fix this is to start making it easier even faster

12.1.20  1:32 pm   do you have a favorite time signature

      what's the normal one
